name: Knight of the Deep
storyline: As a wandering fish, you find yourself inside an ocean maze full of predators. While you anxiously try to find your way back, you discover a mysterious sword. As you pick it up, you feel its power flow through your veins, filling you with courage that sends you venturing deeper into the abyss. There you find other helpless creatures in hiding. They speak of a dark oppression that looms, which threaten their once blossoming kingdom.
summary: Explore an ocean world full of adorable characters, menacing foes, and hidden wonders. Knight of the Deep is a 2D action-adventure focused on exploration, combat and puzzle-solving. It combines underwater traversal and out of water platforming.
